data.description:
Have you ever been to a tropical island? With Tiny Island you can dive into a True Tropical Island.

Please use this app when you are relaxed.

Ex:
-While you are lying down in bed 
-While you are sitting on a massage chair

When you dive into Tiny Island, you can see the beauty of nature. Leaves, clouds, sky, sun, moon, shadow, birds, boat, waves, nature sounds, etc... all delightfully animate. 

These animations will help you relax and achieve peace of mind. 

Enjoy!

changelog.change_log:
v1.3.1
*Tiny Christmas - Performance, Sound Effect, Graphics are improved.
v1.3.0
*Added special scenes 'Tiny Christmas'.
*Supported the feature to watch your local movie from virtual smart phone.
*Bug fixed.

*Added special scenes 'Tiny Christmas'.
*Supported the feature to watch your local movie from virtual smart phone.
*Bug fixed.

*Added new scenes 'Air Balloon' and 'Carpet Ride'.
*Changed the behavior of twinkle stars when you choose Day-night cycle OFF and Night.
 Twinkle stars can rotate regardless of your setting.
*Bug fixed.

Added new scene.
Added Day-night cycle ON/OFF.
Added Calming music ON/OFF.
Graphic improvements.
Sound improvements.
*You can hear the spatial audio.
Bug fix.
Thank you for giving us your great feedback!

Bug fix.
The cinematic screen is shown to the right of the island.

Added Virtual Smartphone. It's located on the Deckchair.
Look down to find your own Virtual Smartphone!

Virtual Smartphone has two functions.
1.Show File Browser
 You can browse your media file to watch your video or audio.

2.Show Screen
You can show the cinematic screen to watch your video.

Added 1 minute and 3 minutes in the timer in 
Performance improvements.
Graphic improvements.
